## This folder contains following input and output data files

## Input Files
## Input data              :  task_data.csv
## task description        :  task_description.txt

## Output Files
## Ranked list of sensors  :   ranked_sensors.csv
## Analysis report         :   Analysis_report.pdf
## Python script           :   task_solutions.py
## Jupyter Notebook        :   main_task_code.ipynb
## Requirements            :   requirements.txt
